text: Woke up with an intense cold. Unless I magically turn a corner this afternoon, I think it's best if I quarantine myself and work from home today. I'll check-in with you all in a bit for standup when I call in
Oh no! Feel better, Elise. We’ll talk soon.
Get lots of rest and drink lots of water!! Hope you feel better soon!
and thank you for keeping your germs at home :slightly_smiling_face:
just found the app Brightwheel which has a lot of the same functionality as our timeline / cg inputs. Worth a look. <http://mybrightwheel.com/>
It's interesting to read how parents are using that for nannies/babysitters even though it's intended use is for camps/daycares
its pretty well designed, if not a little granular for our needs…
they’ve got good demo content in their app as well, so you can play around with it without having to set up an actual school / institution.
